welcome_message_body: Welcome to Loyalsock, a charming town in the heart of the United States known for its rich history and beautiful natural scenery. We invite you to explore and enjoy all that our city has to offer.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Lycoming County Airport serves all commercial and private flights.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: The private terminal at Lycoming County Airport caters to private and chartered flights.

wifi.note: Passengers can connect to the airport's free WiFi network after accepting the terms and conditions.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at W T Piper Memorial Airport serves all commercial and private flights.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: The private terminal at W T Piper Memorial Airport is exclusively for private flights and charter services.

wifi.note: Passengers can access free WiFi throughout the airport terminal.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Penn Valley Airport serves domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: The private terminal at Penn Valley Airport is used for private and charter flights.

wifi.note: Passengers can connect to the airport's complimentary WiFi network.
